ComicInfo.Summary: The hunt for Areala continues as Father Crowe and the remaining Magic Priests close in on her, even as she continues to cause mass destruction throughout St. Illumine's church due to the side effects of Seethe's techno virus. At the same time, Father Gomez desperately seeks the aid of the church's supercomputer, Gabriel, to find a cure for the virus that has all but consumed the rest of Areala's humanity. Unfortunately, the cure he finds might heal Areala, but could cause the demise of a brave Magic Priest willing to forsake his life to save hers.
